item.description:
Join fellow Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a Post Valentine's Wednesday night dinner @ Lime Leaf in Weymouth.

Link to Yelp: http://www.yelp.com/biz/lime-leaf-weymouth 

This will be a great opportunity to have some time to meetup with other members for a fun evening. Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dinner @ Lime Leaf

Wednesday, February 16th, 2011 @ 7:00pm
435 Columbian St
Weymouth, MA 02190
 339-499-5350
Website: http://www.thaifooddirect.com/limeleaf/#/about

 

Meeting Location: Inside the front door. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under Alison

Organizer(s):Alison

Min/Max: Min of 4 people 48 hours in advance. Maximum of 16  Guests: none  

Fees: Annual Members FREE, Group Members - $2; $12 to become a 2011 Annual Member ($10 if you are a 2010 Annual Member, a past 2-year Annual Member or Former AO).

RSVP Deadline: 8:00 on Tuesday, February 15th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer and will be considered a No-Show per our guidelines on the About Us page. Inclement Weather: Please see our Weather policy on the About pages. We will update this section a few days before if the forecast calls for more than light flurries.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

Please click on restaurant link provided below and click directions link for google maps.

http://www.thaifooddirect.com/limeleaf/#/about
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and will be waiting inside the entrance.
item.why: Let's get our ethnic series underway with some tasty Thai cuisine. Pardon my punny description, but I knew it would get your attention.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Let's get Thai'd up!
